title: Can't move at all?
body: I'm unable to click anything, can't upgrade abilities with hotkeys or open the shop with my hotkey, I've tried to reconnect and completely close legue of legends to no avail. losing my ranked game and my friends placement match over this issue. ALT+F4 doesnt work either.

replies.body: It sounds a lot like you might be having the same Discord Overlay issues a lot of players have been seeing. Do me a favor and close discord completely (or simply disable the overlay feature) and test it in a custom/practice match. Don't play ranked or normal until you know this is fixed, I don't want you getting unwanted punishments or losing placements over this!
yeah, this fix should be stickied and not only posted on twitter.
